title.narrative: A clear evidence base generated from high quality evaluations of SP implementation for learning, decision-making and accountability

description.narrative: ECA RO will implement the 2019-2021 Regional Evaluation Strategy that promotes an effective regional evaluation function to generate evaluative evidence for informing and influencing programming and decision making, and for making UN Women a more effective organization in the ECA region. At the regional level, ECA RO will follow a strategic evaluation planning approach while prioritizing the provision of evaluation quality assurance service support at the country level.

sector.narrative: High quality of programmes through knowledge, innovation, RBM and evaluation
